q: ( Microsoft CRM 2011 Release Candidate Available, Launch Date Set The move is an example of Steve Ballmer 's commitment last year that the company is`` all in'' on cloud computing. This is the first time we've made a release in the cloud before we have done so in the server version, and I think that really reflects the push by Microsoft into the cloud, Steve Ballmer said in a statement. In fact, Microsoft's Dynamics CRM Online service is based on Microsoft's Dynamics CRM 2011 package, which is set for its own launch on Thursday.

Mike Pence said the decision to pursue QE2 is an example of the failure of the current policy that mandates the Federal Reserve focus on full employment and inflation. Fed Chairman Ben Bernanke has repeatedly stated that he is confident the central bank has the tools to prevent inflation, and will be monitoring the buyback program for any signs of nascent inflation.
